channel.title: Rics NoteBook
channel.description: Studying the Art of Science & the Science of Art

item.title: Variational Quantum Eigensolver: An Efficient Approach to Quantum Simulations
item.description: Explore the Variational Quantum Eigensolver (VQE), a powerful quantum algorithm designed to calculate the ground-state energy of quantum systems efficiently. Learn about its iterative hybrid approach and its applications in quantum simulations.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)
